mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.room_code AS roomCode, r.room_name AS roomName, r.room_type AS roomType, r.theme AS theme, r.description AS description, r.image_url AS imageUrl, r.capacity_min AS capacityMin, r.capacity_max AS capacityMax, r.base_price AS basePrice FROM room r WHERE r.is_active = 1 AND r.capacity_min <= #{peopleCount} AND r.capacity_max >= #{peopleCount} AND r.room_id NOT IN ( SELECT res.room_id FROM reservation res WHERE res.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND res.status = 'CONFIRMED' ) ORDER BY r.base_price ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room ( room_code, room_name, room_type, theme, description, image_url, capacity_min, capacity_max, base_price, is_active ) VALUES ( #{roomCode}, #{roomName}, #{roomType}, #{theme}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{capacityMin}, #{capacityMax}, #{basePrice}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.room_code AS roomCode, r.room_name AS roomName, r.room_type AS roomType, r.theme AS theme, r.description AS description, r.image_url AS imageUrl, r.capacity_min AS capacityMin, r.capacity_max AS capacityMax, r.base_price AS basePrice, r.is_active AS isActive FROM room r ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
